1429270.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Underground Map Pack
1429270.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Underground Map Pack

The Underground Map Pack features hand-drawn images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools. This art package allows for the creation of underground and cavernous locations and works seamlessly with all other SmiteWorks hand-drawn art packages.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Underground base background image and 3 premade maps of underground places
  • Brushes (wall and tunnel brushes)
  • Decorations include stone floors, natural columns, dirt textures, stalagmites, and more effects for stained texture overlays to add a new level of detail to your parchment style maps
  • Tiles contain walls and tunnel elements for creating rooms, passageways, and other underground locations
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
